message:update.title: Release of Breeze::OS V2.0 [amd64]
message:update.content-body: Release of version 2.0 of the Breeze::OS 64-bit GNU/Linux distribution, which is based on the Slackware64 14.2 release. The Xfce [4.12], Mate [1.16], and KDE [4.14.3] desktops are offered. The Live DVD ISO is available for download at https://breezeos.sourceforge.io. The Breeze::OS installer brzinst, now includes an encryption page, allowing you to setup disk encryption for your installation. It can also be invoked, as just another session, by using our display manager brzdm. The package manager is now, also offered in a self-run package; allowing it to be run independently of the installed packages. You can download it; and execute it in console mode. It is located at https://breezeos.sourceforge.io/distfiles/slackware/amd64/2.0/brzpkg-x64.run
